description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". One of a series of magazine films depicting various aspects of life in West Germany. Looks at waste recycling, Berlin's International Green Week agricultural show, children learning about art at the Action Centre set up by the Germanic National Museum, Nuremburg, the Black Forest area, the 30th Anniversary of NATO, female rock singer Inga Rumpf.
